## BndDelayedResponsePatternUT Globally
```
Globally, it is always the case that if "R" holds, then "Q" holds after at most "c0" time units for at least "c1" time units
```
```
true;⌈R⌉;⌈true⌉ ∧ ℓ ≥ 50;⌈Q⌉ ∧ ℓ < 50;⌈!Q⌉;true
```
